task.summary: Add user friendly release date and rating
Add user friendly release date and rating
Add changes and gridview instead of recycler view
Add sort by spinner in app bar
Add savings of instance state after a device has been rotated
Add for trailers RecyclerView horizontal scrolling
Add smaller space between trailer images
Add check if there is no trailers to show
Add backdrop and changes in layout
Add right image size to be fetch depends on device's dpi
Add icon play in a backdrop and play the first trailer onclick
Add runtime info and upgrade to 25 sdk

MESSAGE.value: Add user friendly release date and rating
Add changes and gridview instead of recycler view
Add sort by spinner in app bar
Add savings of instance state after a device has been rotated
Add for trailers RecyclerView horizontal scrolling
Add smaller space between trailer images
Add check if there is no trailers to show
Add backdrop and changes in layout
Add right image size to be fetch depends on device's dpi
Add icon play in a backdrop and play the first trailer onclick
Add runtime info and upgrade to 25 sdk
